episodes.title: An Expert Explains Cult Recovery (Part Two) with Janja Lalich PhD
episodes.description:
In part two of this series, I revisit the topic of cult recovery with Dr Janja Lalich, one of the most well-respected cult experts, to discuss how cults exert influence and what can be done to break free from their vice-like grip.

Timestamps:
00:01:51 - How do people get involved in cults?
00:23:03 - How do people recover from a cult experience? 
00:34:08 - Is it possible to extract someone from a cult? 
00:44:03 - What do you think the long-term solution is?

episodes.title: An Expert Explains Cult Recovery (Part One) with Alexandra Stein PhD
episodes.description:
What do cults do mentally and emotionally to their followers and how can those breaking free properly recover from their experience? I'm joined by cult expert Dr Alexandra Stein who shares her considerable knowledge and insights.

Questions answered in our discussion:
13:43 - How do people get involved in cults?
42:54 - How do cults affect people?
1:09:06 - How do people recover from the cult experience?
